data.name: Metal Carnage
data.detailed_description:
Metal Carnage is a car-based online session shooter.


Welcome to the club!
Become a raider, buy and customize your cars and battle. Once you fight your first battle you’ll know what real action driving means. Speed, guns, sharp turns and earth-shattering explosions are your close friends in this high-paced world. Unleash destruction on whoever gets in your way!

Game mode

Domination
2 teams fighting each over to capture all the turrets on the map. Capture all the turrets, or hold the most of them by the end of the match to gain your victory.
Every turret has 2 guns to push enemy back or destroy him. Your main objective is to capture enemy turrets, but don't forget to defend yours.
You can heal your turret by standing in it's range. More allies defend the turret, more heal it gets.
Play together, play smart!

Cars

9 unique cars of 3 different classes available right away!
And 18 more cars of 5 different classes will be released in upcoming updates!

Are you a connoisseur of rarity? We’ve carefully restored classic models in case you’re going for that vintage look.
Love off-roading? Go for bulk and power. We’ve got the most high-powered monsters around.
Are you a race car driver at heart? We have a whole fleet of fast, high-performance vehicles at your disposal.

Try them all and find your match!

Guns

Every car is equipped with it's own unique gun, bringing you different game experience with every new car you get.
Have as much fun as you want!

Customization and tuning

A rich customization system lets you turn your metal monster into whatever you want it to be.
Individualize your car with armor, spoilers, bumpers and dozens of paints. Choose from lots of awesome prints - including skulls, flames and blood stains - to make your car uniquely formidable.

Make every raider remember your colors and fear your arrival in battle.

data.short_description: Metal Carnage is a car-based online session shooter... With turrets!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2,66 Ghz or AMD Phenom™ X3 2,4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 240 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: keyboard, mouse

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: keyboard, mouse
